QuestData.Title: Danger in Daruukhan
QuestData.Description:
I guess there's nothing to be done but send you and Taivan back to Maruukai.
Wait... who is that approaching? Not another stranger with a giant bakar, I hope!
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to the Teerai Messenger to hear Selbekh's urgent request.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, $n! Thank Ohn'ahra the messenger found you. We have our hands full here!
